title: The Chosen of Shar
content:
The Chosen of Shar is naturally updated as you progress through the Main Storyline with Shadowheart and continue to follow the objectives listed under her main Companion Quests: Daughter of Darkness. This quest begins after you rescue Halsin during Rescue the Druid Halsin.
